summary: Just a another dagger (end game design in mind)
descriptionHtml:
[i]A dagger more geared towards end game, Hopefully you enjoy it, i'm not a big fan of the Daedric or Dragonbone weapons.. so i made something to fit my endgame
[/i]
[b]Craftable[/b] [i]under Daedric, (but you only need Ebonysmithing to make)[/i]
[b]Temperable[/b]

[i]I didn't throw the damage through the roof as i wanted to keep it semi-friendly, wasn't going for a god item or a cheat weapon. just something slightly better than Daedric, but more appealing to look at. Also, i have as an optional file, the DSR patch
[/i]
[b]PS[/b]. [i]The value in the inventory model, is with one handed at 58 (wasn't thinking when i uploaded that image)
[/i]
[b]Tools Used:[/b]
3ds Max
Zbrush
Mudbox
Photoshop

[b]Credits:[/b]
all of those that helped me out along the way during my learning (still learning)
Bestheda for Skyrim
Nexus for this site
[b]
Permission:[/b]
Can use any part of my file as long as you credit me as the original author. [b]NOT FOR USE IN ANY MOD REQUIRING PAYMENT![/b]
author: scuffed_down

files.name: Dual Sheath Redux - Gut Ripper Patch
